author: Aaron Jones
description:
At their first attempt, developers Sandfall have made an instant RPG classic in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33. With its influences clear to see, the game blends classic RPG elements with modern a style and themes wrapped up in a mesmerising story. A grimdark story that pays homage to the great Japanese RPGs of the past, […]

The post REVIEW: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
